FUNCTIONAL_SCORE.name: 功能得分
FUNCTIONAL_SCORE.description: 功能实现完整性与正确性

PERFORMANCE_SCORE.name: 性能得分
PERFORMANCE_SCORE.description: 系统处理速度与资源效率

STABILITY_SCORE.name: 稳定性得分
STABILITY_SCORE.description: 系统长时间无故障运行能力

SECURITY_SCORE.name: 安全得分
SECURITY_SCORE.description: 抵御安全威胁与数据保护能力

COMPATIBILITY_SCORE.name: 兼容性得分
COMPATIBILITY_SCORE.description: 与不同软硬件环境适配程度

COMPLIANCE_SCORE.name: 合规性得分
COMPLIANCE_SCORE.description: 符合行业标准与法规要求

AVAILABILITY_SCORE.name: 可用性得分
AVAILABILITY_SCORE.description: 服务可正常访问的时间比例

USABILITY_SCORE.name: 易用性得分
USABILITY_SCORE.description: 界面友好与操作便捷程度

MAINTAINABILITY_SCORE.name: 可维护性得分
MAINTAINABILITY_SCORE.description: 系统修改、更新与修复便利性

SCALABILITY_SCORE.name: 可扩展性得分
SCALABILITY_SCORE.description: 适应业务增长的处理能力
